title: Ticket #6445: when using SciTokens the starter should refresh the cred (from shadow)
description:
Currently, the sandbox cred only gets updated if a new job comes along and happens to update the cred in the SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY on the execute machine.

For SciTokens, we need to actively refresh this by pulling in a new cred from the shadow, having the CREDMON process the cred into a cc file, and copying that cc file into the job sandbox. We do this every five minutes by default.
check_ins: 2017-Oct-12 15:15   Check-in [52566]: Have the starter periodically refresh the sandbox credential by refetching from the shadow. #6445 (By zmiller )
